meanings.sent1: The plastic bag is nonhygroscopic, so it keeps the cookies dry.
meanings.sent2: The desert plant is nonhygroscopic, allowing it to thrive in arid conditions.
meanings.sent3: The nonhygroscopic umbrella refused to get wet in the rain, much to the surprise of its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her nonhygroscopic personality remained unaffected by the tears shed around her.
meanings.sent5: The nonhygroscopic sponge repelled water like a force field.

meanings.sent1: The nonhygroscopic fabric of his jacket kept him warm and dry in the snow.
meanings.sent2: The nonhygroscopic material of the tent prevented any leaks during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The nonhygroscopic cat avoided the rain by finding shelter under the porch.
meanings.sent4: Her nonhygroscopic hair seemed to defy the humidity of the tropical climate.
meanings.sent5: The nonhygroscopic paper remained crisp and untouched by the spilled water.
